description: This file defines the main controller class 'TodoCtrl' for a TodoMVC AngularJS application, managing todo items, user interactions, and view updates.

classes.name: todos.TodoCtrl
classes.description: Main controller for the TodoMVC app, handling todo list operations, scope bindings, and view interactions.

methods.name: onPath
methods.description: Updates the status filter based on the current URL path.

methods.name: onTodos
methods.description: Updates remaining and completed counts, and persists todos to storage.

methods.name: addTodo
methods.description: Adds a new todo item to the list if the input is not empty.

methods.name: editTodo
methods.description: Sets a todo item into edit mode and clones the original for potential revert.

methods.name: revertEdits
methods.description: Reverts changes to a todo item to its original state.

methods.name: doneEditing
methods.description: Finalizes editing of a todo item, removing it if the title is empty.

methods.name: removeTodo
methods.description: Removes a specified todo item from the list.

methods.name: clearDoneTodos
methods.description: Removes all completed todos from the list.

methods.name: markAll
methods.description: Sets all todos' completed status to the specified boolean value.
